thread.title: Cute boutique hotel walking distance from Penn Station
thread.title_full: Cute boutique hotel walking distance from Penn Station - Review of Hotel Chandler, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jackie B
title: Cute boutique hotel walking distance from Penn Station
text:
This hotel feels small even though it isn't. It is cute and cozy and walking distance from Penn Station and easy walk to Times Sq. and theater district. Yadav, the restaurant manager was extremely accommodating and made us breakfast himself as we arrived in time for a blizzard that later panned out. We enjoyed our short stay.
Room Tip: Top floors have views. Ceilings are high so even though rooms are small, you don't feel squishe... See more room tips
